comments_since_last_sample.body: Due process would be cool

Considering how few weapons exist in civilian life here in the UK, it seems so strange hearing one of us discuss ranged weaponry at such length.  I don't think I heard this level of detail back in the army :/
Anothet game that utilizes the tilting is Insurgency Sandstorm when you're using night vision with IR Laser attachments using NVG point firing.

the ar-reload in regards to the thumb position and the bolt release is not just doable, its best-practice. Its easier to do consistently than to slap the bolt-release. Usually hold a bit higher on the mag, so you dont even have to move the hand further up, it just goes in and the thumb is already there.
